title: Vasantha Sena Song Lyrics Shree
stanzas:
Vasantha saena vasantha saena
vasiyam seiyya piranthavailthaana
nee illaadhu naan ena naanaa
senaa vasantha senaa..(2)

Madha sena manmadha senaa
enakkul edhaiyo
thirudi chendraana
kadhal oorukku
vazhi idhuthaanaa senaa!!(2)
madhana senaa..

Vasantha saena vasantha saena
vasiyam seiyya piranthavailthaana
nee illaadhu naan ena naanaa
senaa vasantha senaa..

Anuvai anu anu anuvaai
en azhagai thulaithavane
anu sakthiyaai irundhu
en uyirai valarthavane

en imaigal irandinai
vidumuraik anuppi
iravinil thookkam keduthavane

Madha sena manmadha senaa
enakkul edhaiyo
thirudi chendraana
kadhal oorukku
vazhi idhuthaanaa senaa!
madhana senaa..

Uyiril uyir pudhaithu
pudhayal eduthavale
uruvam ini edharku
en vetkam koduthavale

poiyaathoru mozhiyil
en meiyyai valaithavane
koiyaathoru kaniyai
kannaal koithavane

Vasantha saena vasantha saena
vasiyam seiyya piranthavailthaana
nee illaadhu naan ena naanaa
senaa vasantha senaa..

Madha sena manmadha senaa
enakkul edhaiyo
thirudi chendraana
kadhal oorukku
vazhi idhuthaanaa senaa!!
madhana senaa..

Vasantha saena vasantha saena
vasiyam seiyya piranthavailthaana
nee illaadhu naan ena naanaa
senaa vasantha senaa..
